titleStmt.title: Learning Theory and Algorithms for Forecasting Non-Stationary Time Series

analytic.title: Learning Theory and Algorithms for Forecasting Non-Stationary Time Series

biblStruct.note: Mehryar Mohri Courant Institute and Google Research New York, NY 10011

abstract.p: We present data-dependent learning bounds for the general scenario of non-stationary non-mixing stochastic processes. Our learning guarantees are expressed in terms of a data-dependent measure of sequential complexity and a discrepancy measure that can be estimated from data under some mild assumptions. We use our learning bounds to devise new algorithms for non-stationary time series forecasting for which we report some preliminary experimental results.
